title: Brexit vote results: The six possible outcomes of Saturday's ballot
text:
Parliament will sit on Saturday in what could be one of the most important Commons’ sessions of the entire Brexit process.

It will consider the Brexit deal that Boris Johnson has secured in Brussels, but the result appears to be on a knife-edge.

With so many variables yet to be ironed out in Westminster, there are a number of different outcomes to Saturday's seismic vote.

So here, we map out the different directions Brexit could go.

Deal passes and Brexit happens on October 31

If MPs approve the deal on Saturday, the Government is then expected to table the Withdrawal Agreement Bill on Monday. MPs could try to amend it to include a second referendum.

However, if all the legislation passes...
description: Parliament will sit on Saturday in what could be one of the most important Commons’ sessions of the entire Brexit process.
